name: 2022 13th International Conference on Networking and Information Technology
content: For papers submitted to ICNIT 2022, There are two options for publication of full your papers as follows: Publication in JAIT. Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and journal editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in the Journal of Advances in Information Technology , which will be indexed by Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CrossRef, CNKI, etc. Publication in JCM. Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and journal editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in Journal of Communications, which will be indexed by Scopus; DBLP; CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; CNKI, etc.
